headline.main: Video of Keith L. Scott Police Encounter

docs.snippet: Rakeyia Scott, the wife of Keith L. Scott, recorded the moments before and after the shooting of her husband by the police in Charlotte, N.C. The video includes graphic violence and disturbing language....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rakeyia Scott, the wife of Keith L. Scott, recorded the moments before and after the shooting of her husband by the police in Charlotte, N.C. The video includes graphic violence and disturbing language.

headline.main: Obama Vetoes Sept. 11 Saudi Bill, Sets Up Showdown With Congress
headline.print_headline: Obama Vetoes Sept. 11 Saudi Bill, Sets Up Showdown With Congress

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Friday vetoed legislation allowing families of victims of the Sept. 11 attacks to sue Saudi Arabia, which could prompt Congress to overturn his decision with a rare veto override, the first of his presidency....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Friday vetoed legislation allowing families of victims of the Sept. 11 attacks to sue Saudi Arabia, which could prompt Congress to overturn his decision with a rare veto override, the first of his presidency.

headline.main: Tunisia Reaches Deal With Petrofac Protesters, in Company Talks
headline.print_headline: Tunisia Reaches Deal With Petrofac Protesters, in Company Talks

docs.snippet: Tunisia has reached a deal with protesters who have disrupted gas production by Petrofac for months, the government said on Friday, part of an effort to stop the British energy firm closing its business....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tunisia has reached a deal with protesters who have disrupted gas production by Petrofac for months, the government said on Friday, part of an effort to stop the British energy firm closing its business.

headline.main: Polish Lawmakers Proceed With Proposal to Ban Abortion
headline.print_headline: Polish Lawmakers Proceed With Proposal to Ban Abortion

docs.snippet: Poland's lawmakers have decided to proceed with work to ban abortion and have rejected a proposal to liberalize the current restrictive law....
docs.lead_paragraph: Poland's lawmakers have decided to proceed with work to ban abortion and have rejected a proposal to liberalize the current restrictive law.

headline.main: Ex-Société Générale Trader’s Huge Fine Is Cut to 1 Million Euros
headline.print_headline: 4.9-Billion-Euro Fine Is Shaved Down to 1 Million for a Rogue Trader

docs.snippet: Friday’s ruling was the latest legal victory for the former trader, Jérôme Kerviel, who won a wrongful dismissal suit in June....

byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and NICOLA CLARK

docs.lead_paragraph: Friday’s ruling was the latest legal victory for the former trader, Jérôme Kerviel, who won a wrongful dismissal suit in June.

headline.main: 'Tobacco Road' Songwriter John D. Loudermilk Dies
headline.print_headline: 'Tobacco Road' Songwriter John D. Loudermilk Dies

docs.snippet: John D. Loudermilk, a singer and songwriter who wrote pop and country songs such as "Tobacco Road" and "Indian Reservation," has died. He was 82....
docs.lead_paragraph: John D. Loudermilk, a singer and songwriter who wrote pop and country songs such as "Tobacco Road" and "Indian Reservation," has died. He was 82.

headline.main: Three’s a Trend: Printed Sweater Vests, Fit for Grandpa

docs.snippet: Gucci, Prada and Michael Kors have all revived the classic, bookish look in a variety of patterns for spring/summer 2017....

headline.main: Judge Rules 37 Years Enough Jail Time for Deputy's Slaying
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules 37 Years Enough Jail Time for Deputy's Slaying

docs.snippet: A man who's been locked up nearly 38 years for his role in the fatal shooting of a western Maryland deputy has served enough time, a judge ruled Friday — but he's not free yet....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who's been locked up nearly 38 years for his role in the fatal shooting of a western Maryland deputy has served enough time, a judge ruled Friday — but he's not free yet.

docs.snippet: In a story Sept. 23 about online reviews, The Associated Press used incorrect style for the name of Yelp, the company that runs an online review website. There is no exclamation point following "Yelp."...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Sept. 23 about online reviews, The Associated Press used incorrect style for the name of Yelp, the company that runs an online review website. There is no exclamation point following "Yelp."

headline.main: Tennessee Man Kills Two Supervisors, Himself After Work Meeting
headline.print_headline: Tennessee Man Kills Two Supervisors, Himself After Work Meeting

docs.snippet: A man who killed his two supervisors at a manufacturing plant in eastern Tennessee before taking his own life did so after becoming upset during a meeting, authorities investigating the crime said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who killed his two supervisors at a manufacturing plant in eastern Tennessee before taking his own life did so after becoming upset during a meeting, authorities investigating the crime said on Friday.
